Sentencas: Phase stability and transport characteristics of (ZrO2)(1-x)(Sc2O3)(x)(CeO2)(y )
Titulo: Phase stability and transport characteristics of (ZrO2)1-x(Sc2O3)x(CeO2)y and (ZrO2)1-x-y-z(Sc2O3)x(CeO2)y(Y2O3)z solid solution crystals

Sentencas: (x = 0.08-0.10; y= 0.005-0.015) and (ZrO2)(1-x-y-z)(SC2O3)(x)(CeO2)(y)(Y2O3)(z) (x = 0.08-0.10; y = 0.005-0.010; z = 0.005-0.020) melt-grown crystals have been studied after air heat treatment at 1000 degrees C for 400 h. Annealing of the (ZrO2)(1-x)(Sc2O3)(x)(CeO2)(y) crystals caused the formation of a rhombohedral phase and reduced the electrical conductivity of the specimens in the entire test temperature range.
Titulo: Phase stability and transport characteristics of (ZrO2)1-x(Sc2O3)x(CeO2)y and (ZrO2)1-x-y-z(Sc2O3)x(CeO2)y(Y2O3)z solid solution crystals

Sentencas: Yttrium co-doping of the (ZrO2)(1-x)(Sc2O3)(x)(CeO2)(y) crystals stabilized the cubic phase for some compositions.
Titulo: Phase stability and transport characteristics of (ZrO2)1-x(Sc2O3)x(CeO2)y and (ZrO2)1-x-y-z(Sc2O3)x(CeO2)y(Y2O3)z solid solution crystals

Sentencas: In two-phase (ZrO2)(1-x-y-z)(Sc2O3)(x)(CeO2)(y)(Y2O3)(z) crystals containing a cubic and a tetragonal phases exhibited conductivity degradation.
Titulo: Phase stability and transport characteristics of (ZrO2)1-x(Sc2O3)x(CeO2)y and (ZrO2)1-x-y-z(Sc2O3)x(CeO2)y(Y2O3)z solid solution crystals

Sentencas: Annealing of cubic crystals caused the formation of the t' phase and increased their conductivity.
Titulo: Phase stability and transport characteristics of (ZrO2)1-x(Sc2O3)x(CeO2)y and (ZrO2)1-x-y-z(Sc2O3)x(CeO2)y(Y2O3)z solid solution crystals
